stimulusHtml: Find the x-coordinate of the critical point of f. Determine whether this point is a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither for the function f. Justify your answer.

features.html: Let f be the function given by \(f\left(x\right)=\frac{\ln x}{x}\) for all x  >  0. The derivative of f is given by \(f'\left(x\right)=\frac{1-\ln x}{x^2}\) .
